Desc.entry: Aims to develop new and existing audiences for contemporary dance by producing and promoting high quality work by UK and international artists. Danceworks programming and producing model is based on tried and tested pilot projects developed in South Yorkshire that are audience development led. Committed to supporting the creation of new work by outstanding artists. A registered ompany limited by guarantee 4113166.

ContactName.entry: Annabel Dunbar, Artistic Director/Dave Palmer, Administrator
